hints.content:
We know the $\greenD{\text{total}}$:

There are $\greenD{54}$ students total.


And we know the $\purpleC{\text{size of the groups}}$:

There are $\purpleC9$ students in each group.

To find out how many groups of students there are, we can divide the $\greenD{54}$ students into groups of $\purpleC9$.

$\greenD{54}\div\purpleC9$

question.content:
For a field trip, $54$ students will be split evenly into groups of $9$. 

**Which expression helps us find out how many groups of students will be on the field trip?**

[[â˜ƒ radio 1]]
